ComicInfo.Summary: Sixty years ago, the Crimson Nun battled the forces of Nazi Germany to prevent the power of the fallen angel Azazel from falling into Hitler's hands. Now, Areala must try to prevent another madman from finding Azazel's earthly prison and obtaining the same power. Instructed by Father Clifton, Areala departs for Israel to stop international criminal Ruprecht Marsch before he succeeds in acquiring the power offered by the imprisoned angel. But in order to stop Marsch, Areala must first get by his bodyguard, the mysterious martial arts master, Mr. Zhu.
